DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy BOTOX® ( botulinum toxin Type A ) pediatric patient low limb spasticity .
DOC.brief_title: BOTOX® Treatment Pediatric Lower Limb Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Minimum weight 10 kg/22 lb Cerebral palsy dynamic muscle contracture /spasticity ankle Muscular dystrophy , myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , mitochondrial disease Uncontrolled epilepsy Botulinum Toxin therapy serotype condition within last 6 month History surgical intervention lower study leg plan surgery limb study Previous casting study limb spasticity within 6 month dynamic splint within 3 month , plan cast dynamic splint spasticity study limb affect upper limb study
